title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: Midland/Odessa to Fort Davis
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     Midland/Odessa to Fort Davis                Map from Midland/Odessa to Fort Davis          Â   From Midland/Odessa take I-20 west to Pecos.  From Pecos take Highway 17 south through Balmorhea to Fort Davis. (About 2.5 hours)
